# The `OverlayFileSystem` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A file system that allows overlaying one <code>AbstractFileSystem</code> on top of another. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

## Description {#details}

A file system that allows overlaying one <code>AbstractFileSystem</code> on top of another.

Consists of a stack of &gt;=1 <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/filesystem">FileSystem</a></code> objects, which are treated as being one merged file system. When there is a directory that exists in more than one file system, the <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/overlayfilesystem">OverlayFileSystem</a></code> contains a directory containing the union of their contents. The attributes (permissions, etc.) of the top-most (most recently added) directory are used. When there is a file that exists in more than one file system, the file in the top-most file system overrides the other(s).

Definition at line 391 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/virtualfilesystem-h">VirtualFileSystem.h</a>.
